author: sarowe
msg: LUCENE-3753: Clover fixes: Added non-clover-invoking compile-core target specializations to the lucene/test-framework and lucene/tools modules, since these classes have no tests, and lucene/test-framework sources are already included in every other module's clover instrumentation; and moved generate-clover-reports from lucene/common-build.xml to lucene/build.xml, since it doesn't need to be shared elsewhere.
